entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
